e: ￹`O~ `maan~ `ko~ `sa~`sanga'~`en~ `ita~?￺What shall we make?￻我們要製作什麼？
￹`Sa~`nga'en~ `no~ `Kawas~ `ko~ `kakarayan~ `ato~ `hekal~.￺God made the heavens and earth.￻上帝造天地萬物
￹`Pasa~`nga'en~ `ko~ `paliding~ `iso~.￺Have your vehicle fixed.￻你的車子拿去修理
￹`Ma~`sanga'~`to~ `ko~ `faloco'~ `nira~.￺His attitude has changed.￻他的心意改變了 (態度) ，他已心平氣和了
￹`Ma~`sa~`sanga'to~ `kami~ `anini~.￺We (two) have been reconciled.￻我們已互相諒解了，我們已和解了
